news.title: The Whole Hog Student Special: "We are never the finished article. But everything we do should be a form of learning"
news.summary: The start of an academic year is a time of high excitement. We meet new people. Broaden our horizons. And generally form the person that you will become.

news.title: Louisa Harland, Liam Cunningham and Jack Reynor among over 1,800 signatories on Film Workers for Palestine pledge
news.summary: The film workers pledge would include boycotting "festivals, cinemas, broadcasters and production companies" associated with Israeli film institutions.

news.title: Mitski announces concert film Mitski: The Land
news.summary: The film takes place over three nights of performances in Atlanta, Georgia.

news.title: MTV VMAs winners round-up
news.summary: Sabrina Carpenter displayed her support for the trans community with her performance of 'Tears'

news.title: Against All Certainty: A Celebration of Michael D. Higgins at The National Concert Hall (Photos)
Supertramp frontman Rick Davies dies aged 81
news.summary: His death comes following a 10 year battle with cancer.

news.title: Trailer released for RTÉ's The Walsh Sisters starring Louisa Harland
Irish football fans protest Viktor Orbán at World Cup qualifier: "Orbán is not welcome in Dublin."
news.summary: "I think the vast majority of Irish people would reject his sort of politics, but let him come and let him see what proper freedom looks like," said Green Party Leader Roderic O'Gorman.

news.title: Greg Freeman at The Workman's Club (Photos)
Gareth Sheridan denounces Fine Gael's block on council nomination of independents as "poor judgment"
news.summary: "The Harris diktat block is unprecedented, undemocratic and an affront to the Constitution," Sheridan said.
